keys: Ciencia SESE. Elementos vivos. Hoja de trabajo

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4558</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A Study of Trees</string>
            <string language="es">Un estudio de árboles</string>
            <string language="ga">Staidéar ar Chrainn</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Studie der Bäume</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une étude des arbres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um estudo das árvores</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Uno studio degli alberi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια μελέτη των δέντρων</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Facts about trees, plus activities that encourage children to observe, study and learn the functions of deciduous and evergreen tree parts.</string>
            <string language="es">Datos prácticos sobre árboles, junto con actividades que animan a los niños a observar, estudiar y aprender las funciones de las partes caducas y perennes de los árboles.</string>
            <string language="ga">Fíricí faoi chrainn, chomh maith le gníomhaíochtaí a spreagann leanaí le féachaint ar chodanna crainn duillsilteacha agus síorghlasa, staidéar a dhéanamh orthu agus a bhfeidhmeanna a fhoghlaim.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SESE Science</string>
            <string language="es">Ciencia SESE. Elementos vivos. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">SESE Eolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Living Things</string>
            <string language="ga">Nithe Beo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tatsachen über Bäume, plus Aktivitäten, die 
Kinder anregen zu beobachten, die Funktionen der laubwechselnden und 
immergrünen Baumteile studieren und erlernen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Faits sur des arbres, plus les activités qui 
encouragent des enfants à observer, étudier et apprendre les 
fonctions des pièces à feuilles caduques et à feuilles persistantes
d'arbre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fatos sobre árvores, mais as atividades que 
incentivam crianças observar, para estudar e aprender as funções 
das peças deciduous e evergreen da árvore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fatti circa gli alberi, più le attività che 
consigliano ai bambini osservare, studiare ed imparare le funzioni 
delle parti decidue ed evergreen dell'albero.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεγονότα για τα δέντρα, συν τις δραστηριότητες που 
ενθαρρύνουν τα παιδιά για να παρατηρήσουν, να μελετήσουν και να 
μάθουν τις λειτουργίες των αποβαλλόμενων και αειθαλών μερών 
δέντρων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SESE Wissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lebende Sachen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Choses Vivantes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coisas Vivas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza di SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cose Viventi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
